title: Google Play Storeâ€™s Safety section begins rolling out to users, summarizing how apps use your data
content:
Nearly a year ago, Google announced a new Safety section with the intent of improving transparency in how apps collect and process data, following in the footsteps of Apple and the Privacy Labels on the App Store. This new Safety section essentially provides an overview of what data an app collects or shares, if that

The post Google Play Store’s Safety section begins rolling out to users, summarizing how apps use your data appeared first on XDA.
description: The Google Play Store's Safety section is now rolling out to users, and it shows how apps use and process the data that they collect.
